title: Unfurnished apartments, Large studio apartments, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-On RTC Las Vegas bus lines', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Free premium cable', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-No long term lease required', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Apartment near Nellis Air Force Base', '-Near Las Vegas Speedway', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
